title: Riot Real talk here.
body:
Seriously, we need Draft Normals (/whatever you want to call them norms, they just need bans) so that we can not have to be facing cancer champs in every single game.

Like legitimately it's hard to have any semblance of fun when i don't want to play ranked during the holidays, so i'm forced into norms where i can't even ban away any champions that are just cancer. (READ: I'M SICK OF FUCKING DRAVEN)

replies.body:
*resorts to coop vs AI*

*lanes against Draven Bot*

*fights cancer*

*asks Riot for draft pick coop vs AI*

Greetings Valor Carrys,

Riot did a post on the Dev Corner 2 months ago [found here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/iqcQYuBZ-so-normal-draft), talking about the reason why most regions now a days don't have draft pick. They talked about how compared to other game modes normal draft didn't actually have that many people playing it which would often lead to bad game experiences. 

---

Along with this I think that the main reason that we don't have draft pick in OCE is because of our small play base. Currently if Riot were to give us draft queue that would split up the player base more than it currently has game mode wise and make queue times even longer. This is a difficult issue to handle, while I am sure you want to play these game modes, we don't want people waiting for minutes on end just trying to find a game. With it set up this way Riot has done a lot of research and testing to find a good middle ground between the game modes that are the most popular and queue times.

---

As for facing the same champions every game, in my personal gameplay I rarely run into the same champions twice in a row when I am playing blind pick with friends. Yes there are flavor of the month champions that you will run into more often, but this can be a good thing as it is good practice to vs them in case you have to go up against them in ranked. Along with this normals is a much less stressful environment, so it lets you experiment with ways to counter these champions as well. 

So in my opinion while yes you will run into a lot of people playing strong champions in normals, its not every game, and if you have the right mindset it can be a good learning experience for when you play ranked.

---

As a side note, you noted that you don't want to play ranked during the school holidays, may I ask specifically your reason behind this?

---

All up I hope this helps give a bit of insight into the reasoning behind why this is the case with not having draft queue on OCE. If there are any other questions I can answer or any other ways I can help let me know. Good luck in your games.

~Elam
What's so bad about Draven besides his damage?

they have removed Draft Normals from most other servers. Only like 3 servers have it now and Riot plans to remove it from there too.

So there is no way they would add it to OCE.
